body_html: I think it's not too hard now, just look for perplexity to go down to around 4, maybe 4.2 -- and the lower the better, esp. on more complex sentences. But indeed, it's a bit of a magic number and some examples might be good to have. Code contributions are welcome, just send your CL!

body: I think it's not too hard now, just look for perplexity to go down to around 4, maybe 4.2 -- and the lower the better, esp. on more complex sentences. But indeed, it's a bit of a magic number and some examples might be good to have. Code contributions are welcome, just send your CL!
